DOC.brief_title: Suicidality Suicide Attempt Among HIV Patients Efavirenz-containing Versus Efavirenz-free Antiretroviral Regimens
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com At least 6 month enrollment first prescription Antiretroviral naive No diagnosis HIV patient record Age < 12 year
